citation_details.title: BrainOmni: A Brain Foundation Model for Unified EEG and MEG Signals
citation_details.author: Q Xiao, Z Cui, C Zhang, S Chen, W Wu
citation_details.abstract: Electroencephalography (EEG) and magnetoencephalography (MEG) measure neural  activity non-invasively by capturing electromagnetic fields generated by dendritic currents.
citation_details.short_author: Q Xiao, Z Cui, C Zhang, et al.

citation_details.title: The spatiotemporal neural dynamics of object recognition for natural images and line drawings
citation_details.author: JJD Singer, RM Cichy, MN Hebart

citation_details.short_author: JJD Singer, RM Cichy, MN Hebart
